ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Don't just stand there,
say something!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Oh, you have a coupon?
Then please select
any one medicine you like.”
